content.en: Tumor analysis: Scientists are using algorithms to answer a wide range of questions about tumor growth and blood vessel formation. These algorithms are being used to analyze images and data to understand the relationships between different properties of tumors, such as their size, metabolism, and blood supply. By using these algorithms, researchers hope to gain insights into how tumors develop and how they can be treated more effectively.
content.da: Tumoranalyse: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at besvare en bred vifte af spørgsmål om tumorvækst og dannelse af blodkar. Disse algoritmer bliver brugt til at analysere billeder og data for at forstå sammenhængene mellem forskellige egenskaber ved tumorer, såsom deres størrelse, stofskifte og blodforsyning. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer håber forskerne at få indsigt i, hvordan tumorer udvikler sig, og hvordan de kan behandles mere effektivt.
